import React, { useContext } from 'react' import logo from '../images/logo.png'; import title from '../images/title.png'; import Texts from '../Texts'; import { Context } from '../Context'; export default function Header(changeLang) { const { lang, setLang } = useContext(Context); const texts = Texts[lang]; function changeLang() { lang == 'ar' ? setLang('en') : setLang('ar') } return (
) }
